empty_account_heading: Sync products with your facebook catalog
empty_account_context_text: Sync your products to facebook catalog. Create a shop to sell on facebook and instagram
no_catalogs_empty_content_text: Sync your products to facebook catalog. Create a shop to sell on facebook and instagram
add_catalog_id_content: Add a catalog id from facebook
pending_sync_status_inactive: Product sync is disabled. Products wont be synced to facebook
pending_sync_status_active: Click the Start Sync button to start syncing for this catalog
error_sync_status_inactive: Product sync is disabled. Products wont be synced to facebook
pushed_sync_status_active: AutoSync in on. Latest products will be synced no action needed.
start_sync_loading: We are syncing your products. Check back later
